file.content:
theme:
  name: material
  features:
    # Navigation
    - navigation.tabs
    - navigation.sections
    - navigation.indexes
    - navigation.path
    - navigation.top
    - navigation.instant
    - navigation.expand
    
    # Table of contents
    - toc.follow
    
    # Search
    - search.suggest
    - search.highlight
    - search.share
    
    # Header
    - header.autohide
    
    # Tags
    - tags
  
  icon:
    repo: fontawesome/brands/github
    tag:
      default: material/tag-outline
    
site_name: Jack's Digital Garden
site_url: https://jchidley.github.io/mkdocs-material-test/

# Repository
repo_url: https://github.com/jchidley/mkdocs-material-test
repo_name: Digital Garden

nav:
  - Home: index.md
  - Archive: archive.md
  - Tags: tags.md
  - Blog:
    - Pi Pico Documentation: 2023-11-05-Pi-Pico.md
    - Template: 2099-12-23-Template.md
  - Programming:
    - Rust: 
      - Overview: rust/index.md
      - Getting Started: rust/2023-03-16-Rust-Beginnings.md
      - How I Learned Rust: 2024-03-10-How-I-Learned-Rust.md
      - General: 2024-05-05-Rust-General.md
      - Data: 2024-05-05-Rust-Data.md
      - Embedded: 2024-05-05-Rust-Embedded.md
    - Python:
      - Overview: Python/index.md
      - Fake Data and Testing: Python/2023-03-16-Python-Fake-Data-and-Testing.md
      - Useful Libraries: Python/2023-03-16-Python-Links.md
    - F#:
      - Overview: F#/index.md
      - Continuing to choose F#: "F#/2017-04-28-Continuing-to-choose-F#.md"
      - Testing With F#: "F#/2017-10-17-Testing-With-F#.md"
      - Testing and FParsec: F#/2017-10-23-Testing-and-FParsec.md
      - Using FsCheck: F#/2017-10-28-Understanding-and-Using-FsCheck.md
      - Computational Expressions: "F#/2017-10-30-The-Point-of-F#-Computational-Expressions-AKA-F#-Monads.md"
    - Julia:
      - Introduction: 2023-03-21-Julia.md
      - Drawing: 2023-04-08-Julia-Drawing.md
  - Hardware:
    - Raspberry Pi: 
      - Overview: Pi/index.md
      - Home Router: Pi/2020-01-05-Building-A-Raspberry-Pi-Home-Router.md
      - Cross-Compilation: Pi/2020-02-11-QEMU-distcc-Raspberry-Pi.md
      - Alpine Router: Pi/2020-11-18-Alpine-Linux-Raspberry-Pi-Router.md
      - Arch Linux: Pi/2020-12-17-Arch-Linux-Raspberry-Pi.md
      - X11: Pi/2022-07-09-Rasbian-X11.md
      - Pi Gen: Pi/2022-07-16-Pi-Gen.md
      - Pi Pico: Pi/2022-07-17-Pi-Pico.md
      - iPad Development: Pi/2022-07-17-Pi-as-iPad-Development-Machine.md
      - Alpine Image: Pi/2022-08-07-Alpine-Image-Build-Raspberry-Pi.md
    - Embedded: 
      - Overview: Embedded/index.md
      - STM32 Development: Embedded/2017-05-30-STM32-Development.md
      - Toolchains: Embedded/2017-07-01-STM32-Toolchains-and-Developer-Choice.md
    - Arduino:
      - Introduction: 2024-08-25-Arduino.md
      - LCD & Pushbutton: 2024-08-26-LCD-1602-Pushbutton.md
    - Home Automation:
      - Home Assistant/ESPHome: 2023-11-15-Home-Assistant-ESPHome.md
      - Energy Monitor: 2024-06-15-Open-Energy-Monitor-Emon.md
    - Maker Projects:
      - FreeCAD: 2024-09-15-FreeCAD.md
      - VFD 3-Phase Converter: 2023-05-01-VFD-3-Phase-Converter.md
      - Lathe & Milling: 2024-08-04-Lathe-Milling.md
      - Phase-Locked Loop: 2024-08-17-Phase-Locked-Loop-PLL.md
  - Operating Systems:
    - Linux: 
      - Overview: Linux/index.md
      - Traffic Management: Linux/2020-01-07-Traffic-Manager-Not-Firewall.md
      - DNS Setup: Linux/2020-01-08-DNS-Setup-For-DIY-Home-Router.md
      - Minimal Boot: Linux/2020-01-27-Simplest-possible-Linux-boot.md
      - Filesystems: Linux/2020-01-28-FileSystems.md
      - DD Command: Linux/2020-02-02-DD.md
      - Alpine Install: Linux/2020-02-09-Alpine-Linux-Install.md
      - Boot Process: Linux/2021-06-14-Booting-Linux-and-Other-Operating-Systems.md
      - Arch GUI/VNC: Linux/2021-06-15-Arch-Linux-GUI-VNC.md
      - Arch Install: Linux/2021-06-17-Arch-Linux-Installation.md
      - Vim: Linux/2022-07-14-Vim.md
      - Tmux: Linux/2022-07-16-Tmux.md
      - NixOS: 2024-02-29-NixOS.md
    - Apple: 
      - Overview: Apple/index.md
      - Python on Apple: Apple/2021-06-06-python-apple.md
      - Mac Setup: Apple/2021-06-26-Mac-Setup.md
      - Surface Laptop: 2024-01-17-Microsoft-Surface-Laptop-4.md
  - Tools:
    - Git: 2024-01-28-Git.md
    - Neovim: 2023-04-14-Neovim-Lua.md
    - Helix: 2024-02-13-Helix.md
    - chezmoi: 2024-02-12-chezmoi.md
    - Home Maintenance:
      - Plumbing: 2024-04-14-Plumbing.md
      - House Electrics: 2024-03-24-House-Electrics.md
      - Roof Replacement: 2024-03-17-Asbestos-Roof-Replacement.md
  - AI and Data:
    - AI Coding: 2025-02-08-AI-Coding.md
    - Database and GraphQL: 2025-02-23-Database_GraphQL.md
    - Testing: 2025-03-01-Testing.md
    - DaVinci Resolve: 2025-03-27-DaVinci-Resolve.md
    - Web Info: 2025-04-21-Web-Site-Information-and-Manipulation.md
  - Other:
    - Games: 
      - Overview: Games/index.md
      - Factorio: Games/2020-01-15-Factorio.md
      - Astroneer: Games/2022-11-09-Astroneer.md
    - Misc: 
      - Overview: Other/index.md
      - Git Epiphany: Other/2017-05-08-Git-Epiphany.md
      - Git Epilogue: Other/2017-05-18-Git-Epilogue.md
      - Python Data: Other/2020-01-17-Data-with-Python.md
      - SQLite: Other/2020-01-23-SQLite-Stuff.md
      - URL Collection: Other/2020-02-09-URL-Dump.md
      - Links: 
        - 2020-03-02: Other/2020-03-02-Links.md
        - 2020-11-18: Other/2020-11-18-Links.md
        - 2023-03-16 Main: 2023-03-16-Links.md
        - 2023-03-16 iPad: 2023-03-16-Links-iPad.md
        - 2023-10-23: Other/2023-10-23-Links.md
        - 2023-11-24: 2023-11-24-Links.md
        - 2023-12-08: 2023-12-08-Links.md
        - 2024-01-17: 2024-01-17-Links.md
        - 2024-05-05: 2024-05-05-Links.md
      - FPGA: Other/2020-03-12-FPGA-and-Amaranth-HDL.md
      - Signals: Other/2020-04-21-Signals.md
      - 3D Printing:
        - Prusa: Other/2020-09-24-Prusa-3d-printer.md
        - Klipper: Other/2020-10-29-Klipper-3D.md
      - Screen: Other/2020-11-13-Screen.md
      - Raku: Other/2020-12-08-Raku.md
      - Audio: Other/2021-02-06-Audio.md
      - Link Dump: Other/2021-03-24-Link-Dump-iPad-Transfer.md
      - Parsing: Other/2021-07-06-Parsing-Compilers.md
      - FastAPI: Other/2022-03-25-FastAPI-and-JavaScript.md
      - Radio: Other/2022-03-25-Radio-and-Electronics.md
      - GitHub Pages: Other/2022-08-04-GitHub-Pages-Jekyll.md
      - CADQuery: Other/2022-10-07-cadquery.md
      - RISC-V: Other/2023-09-22-Risc-V.md
      - Systems: Other/2023-09-24-Systems-on-Systems.md
      - Shell: Other/2023-09-26-awk-sed-bash.md
      - J-Core: 2020-03-02-j-core-links.md
      - Picocomputer: 2023-09-09-Picocomputer.md
      - Programming Languages: 2023-09-04-Writing-A-Programming-Language.md
    - Template: Other/2099-12-23-Template.md

markdown_extensions:
  # Table of contents
  - toc:
      permalink: true
      
  # Code blocks and syntax highlighting
  - pymdownx.highlight:
      anchor_linenums: true
      line_spans: __span
      pygments_lang_class: true
  - pymdownx.inlinehilite
  - pymdownx.snippets
  - pymdownx.superfences:
      custom_fences:
        - name: mermaid
          class: mermaid
          format: !!python/name:pymdownx.superfences.fence_code_format
          
  # Content tabs
  - pymdownx.tabbed:
      alternate_style: true
      
  # Data tables
  - tables
  
  # Footnotes
  - footnotes
  
  # Formatted text and admonitions
  - pymdownx.critic
  - pymdownx.caret
  - pymdownx.keys
  - pymdownx.mark
  - pymdownx.tilde
  - admonition
  - pymdownx.details
  
  # Emoji
  - attr_list
  - pymdownx.emoji:
      emoji_index: !!python/name:material.extensions.emoji.twemoji
      emoji_generator: !!python/name:material.extensions.emoji.to_svg

plugins:
  - search
  - tags:
      tags_file: tags.md
  - git-revision-date-localized:
      enable_creation_date: true
      type: date
  - minify:
      minify_html: true
      minify_js: true
      minify_css: true
  - glightbox:
      touchNavigation: true
      loop: false
      effect: zoom
      width: 100%
      height: auto
      zoomable: true
      draggable: true
  - mermaid2:
      arguments:
        theme: neutral
        flowchart:
          curve: basis

message.content: the public website isn't in sync with this repository

file.content:
# This file is deprecated in favor of deploy.yml
name: ci 
on:
  workflow_dispatch:  # Only run manually
permissions:
  contents: write
jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Notice
        run: echo "This workflow is deprecated. Please use deploy.yml instead."

content.content:
1	name: Deploy MkDocs site to GitHub Pages
     2	
     3	on:
     4	  push:
     5	    branches:
     6	      - main
     7	  workflow_dispatch:
     8	
     9	permissions:

file.content:
name: Deploy MkDocs site to GitHub Pages

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

permissions:
  contents: write

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.10'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install mkdocs-material
          pip install mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin
          pip install mkdocs-minify-plugin
          pip install mkdocs-glightbox
          pip install mkdocs-mermaid2-plugin
          
      - name: Setup Git
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "GitHub Actions"
          git config --global user.email "github-actions@github.com"
          
      - name: Deploy
        run: mkdocs gh-deploy --force

content.text:
The deployment workflow should trigger automatically when you push to main. You can manually trigger it by pushing a change or running the workflow manually on GitHub. To force a deployment now:

```bash
mkdocs gh-deploy --force
```
